choices.A: The RADIUS server queried for authentication is located at IP address 172.25.188.164.
choices.C: The authentication scheme used was pop3.

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: AD
0 means successful authentication.

Selected Answer: AD
Result for radius ... 0: authentication success; 1: authentication failed

questions.question_text:
There are four exchanges during IKEv2 negotiation.
Which sequence is correct?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: D
D is the correct answer

questions.question_text:
Refer to the exhibit, which shows the omitted output of diagnose npu np6 port-list on a FortiGate 1500D.
//IMG//

An administrator is unable to analyze traffic flowing between port1 and port7 using the diagnose sniffer command.
Which two commands allow the administrator to view the traffic? (Choose two.)

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: CD
Correcting myself, we don't know wheter policies 5 and 17 have anything to do with the mentioned ports so we can't know if that will have any effect on traffic, correct answers would be CD

Selected Answer: BC
There's a problem as BCD are all correct, with an NP6 you can disable offloading via FW policy, via diagnose command and globally under system npu

Selected Answer: CD
Page number 109 has the right answer.

Selected Answer: CD
It cannot be disabled under the firewall policy.

Selected Answer: BC
diagnose npu np6 port-list displays a list of the ports available on Fortigate, it can not be used to disable specific ports. This is either done in the firewall policy itself or with the "diagnose npu np6 fastpatch disable" command. Pages 107 - 109 of the Network Security Support Engineer Study Guide

choices.B: To provide information regarding IPS sessions
choices.C: To restart all IPS engines and monitors

questions.question_text: What is the diagnose test application ipsmonitor 5 command used for?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: D
Bypass mode is the correct answer

Selected Answer: D
Option 5 toggles bypass mode, therefore the correct answer. Option 99 performs the restart.

Selected Answer: D
Option 5 enables IPS bypass mode.

questions.question_text: Which two statements about application-layer test commands are true? (Choose two.)

choices.A: Some of them display statistics and configuration information about a feature or process.
choices.D: Some of them can be used to restart an application.
choices.B: Some of them display real-time application debugs.
choices.C: Some of them display only output, after you run the diagnose debug console enable command.

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: AD
AD are correct according to the study guide.
